title: African participation in Atlantic slave trade

content.prompt: During the seventeenth century, one of the reasons Africans participated in the Atlantic slave trade was

choices.label: the demand for weapons among African elites
bribery of African leaders by Caribbean plantation owners
the desire of African leaders to dominate the Atlantic trade network
the ambition of African leaders to gain a foothold in the Americas

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
